speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from Debt Solutions. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I've told you to leave me alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. I'm just here to discuss your account. Can you verify your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f*** should I give you anything? You don't have the right to call me!

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you I'm just doing my job. I need to verify your information. Can you provide your address, please?

speaker: Customer
text: Why don’t you shove it? I’m not telling you a damn thing!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your privacy, but without verification, I'm unable to discuss your account details. Can you just confirm your city?

speaker: Customer
text: You know what? You people are just a bunch of thieves! I don’t owe you anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I can assure you we are here to help you, not to steal from you. Please verify your street address so we can move forward.

speaker: Customer
text: F*** off! I’m not giving you a single piece of info!

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand your hesitation. However, without confirmation, I can't provide you with any information about your account. I’m here to assist you.

speaker: Customer
text: I don’t want your help! Just stop calling me already!

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. If you rather not discuss this now, I can note it and try again later. Just let me know.

speaker: Customer
text: You’re wasting my time, you know that? I’m done! Just get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: Understood. Thank you for speaking with me today. If you change your mind, we're here to assist you anytime. Goodbye.
